constituent: intestines, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, piggy bank, sun, day, piglets
hint: Intestines are the part of the body that is taken out of piglets to make piggy banks.
koohiiStory1: Intestines are the part of the body that is taken out of piglets to make piggy banks. Just imagine factory workers scraping out the intestines of real piglets and packaging them up for little children.
koohiiStory2: Taking things too literally, you used a real piglet as a piggy bank. Now when you smash it open to get your coins out, you have to dig out your coins from its intestines. ew.
myStory: ruột. phần ko phải mật. bộ phận mở là ruột.
